title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Lodging
body: Lodging        Bryce Canyon Lodge with a new roof not yet painted. Photographed by Brian B. Roanhorse 14 april, 2016.       Bryce Canyon Lodge est. 1925 Forever Resorts, LLC operates the Bryce Canyon Lodge, with 114 rooms including lodge suites, motel rooms and cabins. The 2016 summer season begins March 25th and runs through middle of November. The dining room at Bryce Canyon Lodge is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. A gift shop is available at the Lodge. Reservations are recommended and can be made by one of the following: Forever Resorts, LLC Forever Corporate Plaza 7501 E. McCormick Parkway Scottsdale, AZ 85258 Reservations: (877) 386-4383 Direct: (435) 834-8700 Online Reservations For lodging in the communities near Bryce Canyon visit Bryce Canyon Country.         Winter Season 2016-2017 Lodging in Bryce Canyon National Park will be open/closed (pending approval) this winter season.   The National Park Service has approved a pilot program that allows up to 35 motel rooms to remain open throughout the 2015-2016 winter season.   Motel rooms will be offered at an off-season discount, and rooms include a free American continental breakfast for guests.     To reserve a motel room this winter at Bryce Canyon National Park, please visit www.brycecanyonforever.com, or call 877-386-4383.       Path to Sunrise Point in winter. Photographed by Brian B.
